results.t: FORGO | definition in the Cambridge Learner's Dictionary
results.p: to decide not to have or do something, although you want to have it or do it: She had to forgo her early ambition to be a writer.
Dec 2, 2016 — The meaning of forgo. Forgo is a verb we can use when we want to say that we're doing without something, or are choosing not to enjoy something.
